text: The DELL i7577-5258BLK-PUS 15.6" FHD IPS GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i5-7300HQ 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD + 128 GB SSD Windows 10 Home VR Ready Gaming Laptop does what it says on the tin. Good for AAA gaming, but the screen brightness could be better. Had a minor issue with the initial setup taking longer than expected, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.

Had several issues with the DELL i7577-5258BLK-PUS 15.6" FHD IPS GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i5-7300HQ 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD + 128 GB SSD Windows 10 Home VR Ready Gaming Laptop since day one. Wi-Fi drops intermittently and the speakers feels cheap. Performance in competitive gaming is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

The DELL i7577-5258BLK-PUS 15.6" FHD IPS GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i5-7300HQ 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD + 128 GB SSD Windows 10 Home VR Ready Gaming Laptop does what it says on the tin. Good for gaming, but the screen brightness could be better. Had a minor issue with driver updates being a bit tricky, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Apex Legends and Valorant. The build quality of the DELL i7577-5258BLK-PUS 15.6" FHD IPS GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i5-7300HQ 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD + 128 GB SSD Windows 10 Home VR Ready Gaming Laptop is solid, and the screen brightness is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

The DELL i7577-5258BLK-PUS 15.6" FHD IPS GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i5-7300HQ 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD + 128 GB SSD Windows 10 Home VR Ready Gaming Laptop does what it says on the tin. Good for content creation and gaming, but the screen brightness could be better. Had a minor issue with the initial setup taking longer than expected, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.
